comment:
I honestly don't care. I only looked at this up, because I was wondering why the hell he's not going to be inside of the next Pirates movie. I was excited for another Pirates of the Caribbean movie, but then my excitement quickly fizzled out after  learned that he won't play Sparrow. 

It's like reliving my greatest childhood disappointments. 
I've never been more disappointed in my life. It's like going to grab a tub of ice cream out of your grandma's refrigerator, only to find that the tub is filled with shrimp. Or trying to butter your toast, and it turns out that leftovers from yesterday's dinner is inside of the butter container. Or finding that round container of cookies inside of your grandma's house, trying to sneak one of them, only to find that the cookie container is filled with sewing supplies! 

This is how I felt when I heard that there was going to be another Pirates of the Caribbean movie, and then you dropped the bomb on me that he won't be playing Sparrow.

Needless to say, I have no enthusiasm to watch the next Pirates movie. I haven't felt this disappointed since getting excited that there would be another addition to the Dragon Ball series, after years of missing Dragon Ball Z, only for Dragon Ball super to suck ass.
author: Koriander Yander

author: The Super Psycho Killer

comment: What more is it going to take for the smokescreen to be lifted from your eyes? This man has a long history of violence, has a self-confessed "hellish temper", has obvious problems with substance abuse, as witnessed by every public appearance in recent times. Winona told us that he "used to smash up everything," he was arrested for smashing up his hotel room while his 21 year old, 100lb gf was crying in the corner of the room, Vanessa would do anything to cover up his crimes and protect her kids' reputation and careers as well as the cash he gives her every month. This man is pure evil, allowing his sick entourage to spread lies about Amber because he knows that his career is over if the truth about him comes out. The guy is violent, aggressive, jealous and paranoid and add alcohol to the mix and I fear for any woman who is with him. Wake up for God's sake. The truth will come out and hopefully he will be arrested and jailed.
author: Monique H

comment: Is anyone naive enough to think that all these horrific stories demonizing Heard come from the media. They are being spoonfed them by Depp and his massive entourage. From the sycophant friend who called her a demon in a NY column, to the bodyguards giving interviews to Tee Emm Zee, to the "sources" telling the media his family hated her, to the lawyers saying she is lying, to the multiple PR reps feeding evil lies to the press, Heard has to come out publicly as the evil Depp machine is so good at destroying her, she has to speak up or the victim will end up being the villain, which is exactly what this evil man and his sick posse want. There are dark forces at work here. Wake up, zombies.
